titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to improve the administration of State homes furnishing care to veterans under the laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.
State Veterans Home Program Improvement Act of 2017
State Veterans Home Program Improvement Act of 2017
State Veterans Home Program Improvement Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
